===Etymology===
{{Han simp|禮|f=豊|t=乚}}.

In Japanese kyūjitai {{lang|ja|禮}}, the unsimplified form of the radical is used, hence overall simplification is {{Han simp|禮|f=示|t=礻|f2=豊|t2=乚}}.

Compare more radical simplifications in Japanese kana [[れ]] and [[レ]].

In current form, {{Han compound|示|alt1=礻|t1=altar|乚|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – performing rites at an altar.
